description: The “Era of Dinosaurs” begins, as dinosaurs rule the world, populated by many ancient species. This era lasts for over 100,000,000 years until it comes to an end as dinosaurs diminish across the world, though some species continue to survive

references.description: Queen mentions dinosaurs having ruled the world for over a hundred million years. Meaning that their era must’ve started over a hundred million years ago, which fits with the equivalent timeline of our world where dinosaurs lived between 250 to 65 million years ago
Vivi refers to that time as the “Era of Dinosaurs”, 交流達の時代, and the larger period as “Prehistory”, 大古)

description: A tree that would come to be known as the “Tree of Omniscience” sprouts on what would be called Ohara Island

references.description: Clover mentions the tree of omniscience being 5000 years old. Clover mentions it has long been used as a library, though the 5000 years refers to the age of the tree, not the age of the library
